scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.generate-brochure: npm run build && node dist/src/services/generateBrochure.js full
scripts.generate-brochure:minimal: npm run build && node dist/src/services/generateBrochure.js minimal
scripts.generate-brochure:both: npm run build && node dist/src/services/generateBrochure.js both
